name: Gravit-e Technologies
tag_list: software-development-company, custom-web-application, web-application-developer, web-application-development, web-application-developer-vancouver, software-company-vancouver, custom-software, web-development, custom-web-software, custom-web-apps
overview: Gravit-e develops and hosts custom business software and web applications for small, rapidly growing companies. We help companies that are struggling with inefficient manual processes and ad-hoc information systems to automate business processes. Our specialty is the development of custom web applications for niche industries, companies that are striving to be industry leaders, and others for whom traditional off-the-shelf software is inadequate.
